price: al Faraón y su nobleza. Pero estos fueron soberbios y se comportaron con arrogancia.
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَالِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wamala-ihi fa-is'takbarū wakānū qawman ʿālīna
